---
title: "Templates"
---


Generic programming and compile-time computation.

## Topics

- [basics](basics.md) - Function, class, and variable templates
- [deduction](deduction.md) - Template argument deduction and CTAD
- [specialization](specialization.md) - Partial and full specialization
- [variadic](variadic.md) - Parameter packs and fold expressions
- [sfinae](sfinae.md) - Substitution failure and enable_if
- [type-traits](type-traits.md) - Type introspection and manipulation
- [metaprogramming](metaprogramming.md) - Compile-time computation
